name: Retail Rush
description:
Introduction

With RETAIL RUSH, awkward training roleplaying games and dreading exams can be history! Provide your sales team with an interactive way to learn. 

RETAIL RUSH teaches how to deal with different client cases: from everyday enquiries to escalated complaints!

Choose your role: Manager or sales associate

RETAIL RUSH offers two levels of training for fashion retail, sales associate and manager. For sales associates the cases are more general and repeat core rules of good service such as listening skills, reflecting to your customer’s emotions and recognizing customer types! Managers are offered a selection of escalated cases such as product complaints and unhappy clients in addition to general enquiries.
